analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Napītisahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paccayā pīti sahagataḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa pe avigate aṭṭhavīsa

original: Napītisahagataṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam na akusalam dhammam paccayā pīti sahagataḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa pe avigate aṭṭhavīsa

original: Napītisahagato naabyākato dhammo pītisahagatassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na pīti sahagataḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ pīti sahagatassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā anantare aṭṭhavīsa …pe… upanissaye
analyzed: paccayo saṅkhitta ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa adhipatiyā anantare aṭṭhavīsa pe upanissaye

original: aṭṭhavīsa, kamme catuvīsa, natthiyā vigate aṭṭhavīsa.
analyzed: aṭṭhavīsa kamme catuvīsa natthiyā vigate aṭṭhavīsa
